title: Retirement Advisor: Bias or Habit?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Which cognitive bias most speaks to today’s retirement challenges? Visual Capitalist offers 50 for you. This podcast (5:06) suggests that the multiplying list of cognitive behavioral biases fail to capture the essential problems as well as Benjamin Franklin’s aphorisms, which are rooted in character issues and poetically expressed. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
